entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Victoria Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 9:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: 3.6°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa
Humidity: 38 %
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: NNE 17 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near the water. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
